title: Mozambique Bazaruto Marine Reserve Resort Escape w. Sunset Views
description: Amid shining sapphire hues, a boutique resort paradise in magical Mozambique awaits at the heart of the Bazaruto Archipelago marine reserve and national park. Sample spiced seafood under the stars at Tartaruga and embark on aquatic adventures in snorkelling, diving and deep-sea fishing amid the azure waters of the Indian Ocean. Indulge in soothing spa treatments at the Anantara Spa while taking in stunning archipelago vistas before taking a sunset stroll across pristine white sands.
